# a [[breechloading]], rapid-fire, long-range [[rifle]] used in the French army from 1866 to 1874
types.html:
chassepot m (plural chassepots)

  1. a breechloading, rapid-fire, long-range rifle used in the French army from 1866 to 1874
trans: a breechloading, rapid-fire, long-range rifle used in the French army from 1866 to 1874

title: chassepot
